alert.note: Alert for Pike (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 4:59PM CDT until June 06 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Pike County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 459 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Narrows Dam, or near Murfreesboro, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro... Narrows Dam... Crater Of Diamonds State Park... Bear Creek Public Use Area... Nathan... Highland in Pike County... Roy... Pike City... Kirby... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
